meanings.definition: Not making or showing false claims or beliefs
meanings.sent1: She appreciated his pretensionless honesty in admitting his mistake.
meanings.sent2: The pretensionless statement was refreshing in a world full of exaggerations.
meanings.sent3: Her pretensionless explanation of the complex topic made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His pretensionless demeanor was like a clear mirror reflecting the truth.
meanings.sent5: The pretensionless simplicity of her words left a lasting impact on the audience.

meanings.sent1: The artist's work was praised for its pretensionless beauty.
meanings.sent2: She preferred a pretensionless lifestyle, avoiding flashy displays of wealth.
meanings.sent3: His pretensionless attitude made him easy to approach and talk to.
meanings.sent4: The pretensionless design of the building stood out among the extravagant structures.
meanings.sent5: In a world of pretentiousness, her pretensionless manner was a breath of fresh air.

meanings.sent1: The pretensionless student was content with simple achievements.
meanings.sent2: He led a pretensionless life, focusing on what truly mattered to him.
meanings.sent3: The pretensionless approach to the project surprised everyone with its effectiveness.
meanings.sent4: Her pretensionless goals were grounded in reality and achievable.
meanings.sent5: In a world of grand ambitions, his pretensionless dreams were humble yet meaningful.
